page.title: 16MOBILE SHOPS
page.content: Most people did use the shops in Ouston at least once a week but mainly for convenience or if they had run out of something. Almost everybody would like to see more choice of shops in the village but realised that this would probably mean higher prices. Only elderly people and those mothers who were at home with young children all day used the local shops on a regular basis. There are also a number of mobile shops that travel around the village regularly but very few people seemed to use them,less than 20%,so they did not seem to be very profitable.
